name.baseName: Dyeing ; Printing and dyeing linen ; Hemp cloth type ; Pad steam dyeing ; All sizes; NESPS2
染色 ; 印染麻布类 ; 麻布类 ; 轧蒸染色 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisChemical coagulation，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / total production time (hours/year)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisChemical coagulation，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / total production time (hours/year)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 染色和印染麻布和麻类织物的工艺，包括轧蒸染色技术，适应于纺织行业生产各种产品，特别是需要麻布和麻织品的场合。相关的末端污染物管理技术旨在去除废水处理中的氨氮、有机氮、化学需氧量和总磷，适用于所有生产规模。它采用包括化学混凝、厌氧生物处理、好氧生物处理以及额外化学处理在内的多步骤处理过程，特别为纺织行业定制以满足严格的废水排放标准。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码17,三级代码173.0,四级代码1733文件，在完整版文件中第231页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: nan
源文件中描述为为印染麻布类，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisChemical coagulation + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment + chemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management88.56，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / total production time (hours/year)
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是化学混凝法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法+化学处理法，其效率为88.56，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间/正常生产时间。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisChemical coagulation + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management87.58，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / total production time (hours/year)
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是化学混凝法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为87.58，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间/正常生产时间。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是化学混凝法，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=绝干污泥量/标准绝干污泥量。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
